bow: mother in law vent bought my son baby first christmas ornament few weeks ago and mentioned it to my mil she pouted and said that she wanted to get him his first christmas ornament well tough she then asked if there was series or anything thought he would like few days later she asked me the same question well today she arrived for weekend visit and has something behind her back she says had to get this because wanted to be the first person to get him this and pulls out baby first christmas ornament im just dumbfounded by this and it really pissed me off told my husband that was angry and his reaction was what do you want me to say remind her that she not the first person to get him first christmas ornament don care how excited she is about her first grandkid he your first kid mom comes before grandma every time unpopular opinion it an ornament this probably won be the last battle with your mil so don know if this is really the hill you wan na die on here be gracious and take the ornament stick it on the tree tell your best friend that your mil is annoying and then move on perhaps he could have both my eldest has two first christmas ornaments also buy both of my kids new ornament every year and have mini tree for all their ornaments some years get them more than one each exactly getting upset about bauble just puts you on her level silently judge her for caring about an ornament and move on that was low of her he could tell her we already bought one for him why not save it for your tree totally annoying guess who gave my son his first gift ever my mother blanket and my mother in law teddy bear it was actually me who bought bear when found out was pregnant and put it under the tree for my fetus that no one even knew about lol first book mother in law again actually me first shoes great grandfather oops that was me too first blanket my mom oh sh actually it was my husbands coworker who knew before anyone because threw up at their work christmas party lol point being just let them have it everyone is so full of hope and excitement and empty promises and every fight got into was not worth it me and my husband laugh about it and most of the stuff people have forgotten about and he not even if she the kind of person to remind you she was the first feel free to lose it in box of stuff next year it setting boundary and she just trampled it she wanted to be the first not just wanted to get him one think that the big issue here she has setting up the narrative to be the first for his important moments and op and husband need to stop it now you re going to get lot of people saying that first ornament isn worth fighting about and honestly it might not be but it could also be pattern of ignoring your wishes as parent and overstepping boundaries would explain to your mil and your husband that while this may seem insignificant to them it not insignificant to you this was special memento that you wanted to give your child and having your mil intentionally interfere with that was hurtful you re the parent you get to decide which milestones moments you want to commemorate with your child your mil will have her own special grandparent grandchild relationship with your child but it won be at your expense all that said be prepared to be ignored my mother gave my daughter her first haircut without telling me and still doesn think it was that big of deal you have to decide where to draw the boundaries and which fights are worth fighting take it with gracious smile then toss it in the trash while packing away the holiday decorations next year if questioned you just reply truthfully that you could find it we have had so many boundary issues so far already and he is only months old she does not listen to my wishes at all and find it even worse when we are visiting at her house you re so right it fresh so the frustration is real but just need to step back and keep this in mind thank you no it petty can be the only one who does something crap and as someone who has been married for 19 years with four children can promise there are bigger battles than having two baby first christmas ornaments on your damn tree but like said if it the hill you wan na die on go for it enjoy the ensuing drama op because that what you re inviting into your life post this over is justnomil they are seasoned pros over there and can gice some great advice and will also probably help you shine your spine for when you ll need it most good luck sounds like you benefit from visit to the justnomil sub where is your husband in all this he has to be involved and be the one setting and reinforcing boundaries with his mother this shouldn be all on you especially since you basically still have newborn your husband has to serve as buffer if he can then at the very least you ll have to significantly limit the time you spend with mil at bare minimum stop going over to her house it easier to push you around when it on her turf know from personal experience how much easier it is to talk about setting boundaries than it is to actually set and enforce them it damn near impossible without supportive and actively engaged partner what do you want me to say that she already had the chance to get do baby first everything for your husband and any of his siblings it is your turn to do the baby first stuff agree with the boundaries but the second part is consequences we asked you to blah blah and you didnt respect our request so have to blah blah it may not work it might work but at this point you don have much to loose cause she already being disrespectful you can always make the ornament disappear if it really bothers you this would have pissed me off too however keep it and add it to the pile that he can take with him when he moves out what jackass removed she can take it home and put it on her own damn tree was looking to see if someone else had shared this sub they are very well versed in mil being crappy thought that where was for second lost asf what is baby first christmas ornament mean get the general idea but wondering what makes it so special don celebrate christmas so not familiar with these things my sons name starts with after my husband and my mil father but she was mad added and name so he has two middle names to punish me she calls him by shortened version of his second middle name every christmas she buys him an ornament every year throw it away make yours the center of your tree and forget where you put hers honestly would regift it to her to put on her tree maybe she will get the hint my mil bought my daughter halloween costume skunk one wtf after already told her got her one this was her first halloween and picked out beautiful high quality giraffe as she is very tall it was perfect well apparently my mil forgot about the costume she bought thank god and couldn help but laugh when she was complaining on the phone to my husband how she had forgotten to give it to us dealt with similar case for much of the first few months with my son ve learned to bite my tongue day thank you and either regift or just have duplicates after all it is just grandmother super in love with her grandchild and wanting to spoil them definitively mistook it for overstepping her grounds still do sometimes but what can you do it all out of love 🤷🏽‍♀️ absolutely agree that you need an involved and supportive spouse if they don set boundaries then setting boundaries as the dil will never work with that said feel like generally women are very attuned to passive aggressiveness and men just don see it as much so while we can see that getting the first christmas ornament was done to preempt op from feeling that satisfaction guarantee you my husband would think what the big deal over christmas ornament he would not understand the subtlety of the transgression it can make getting cooperation in setting boundaries very challenging would have looked her dead in the eye and dropped it from shoulder height onto brick and said oops maybe she gave away firsts to her own mother or mil and regrets it and wants to take them from you to repeat that cycle too bad don put it on your tree heck throw it out if you want make the one you bought front and centre if she asks just be dismissive don know it probably on there somewhere and if she buys any first christmas clothes they don get worn if she asks say got this outfit isn it adorable let her waste her money all she wants she doesn get to have firsts with someone else baby she got to have them with her own babies and now it your turn this is reasonable compromise to keep the peace celebrate christmas but this is not thing for me either but not american so guess it an american tradition tell her that she can keep it for her tree she can start tradition with any future grandkids also what cow definitely be on your guard with your boundaries around her removed it is an ornament that says the year they were born and first christmas have one from my childhood that my mom hung on her tree until moved out and had my own removed aww that really special can imagine them being passed down from generations til one day the entire tree is decorated with first christmas ornaments from all their ancestors oh where you at guess immature because would accidentally lose or misplace her ornament oops honestly my daughter easily has first ornaments for her first christmas my mom bought one my mil did and bought at least one probably and pretty sure had multiple first christmas ornaments from when was kid ve battled my mil over lot of stuff but as long as you are also buying one and her purchasing one is not stopping you this is really probably not worth huge fight oops the baby was so enamored with your precious ornament he pulled it off the tree and whaddya know the ornament broke this is so much more mature than what would be my response of oops the baby was so enamored with your precious ornament he pulled it off the tree and whaddya know the ornament broke here is what he can say mom you got to have our firsts and this is our turn with our child please respect that this is inappropriate and boundaries need to be set firmly or it will only get worse good luck me too yes op this my mil is constantly buying stuff already have or have said want to buy and just do variation of this usually donate or even sell especially the clothes don like change her ornament to big with marker unwanted passive aggressive gifts can go right in the trash or if you are feeling charitable you could donate it to women shelter there may well be mother of new baby who wo get an ornament this year because she dealing with abuse or poverty and that box of stuff could be trash can 🤷🏻‍♀️ know this sucks my mom does this stuff to me would just smile say thank you and move on put it on your tree or don or say it broke but just smile and nod don let your mil drive wedge between you and your husband it not worth playing her games and letting it effect you you picked your husband for life and unfortunately that means her too there will be bigger fish to fry down the road but trust me that being said would have been angry as well lol the other day my mother in law brought over baby first advent calendar she literally thinks my baby should be allowed chocolate because christmas ve told her countless times that my exclusively breastfed month old can not eat any food let alone junk food and she keeps bringing her treats because she thinks mean the advent calendar pissed me off so much that when she handed it to me literally threw it in the garbage right in front of her and then asked her to leave my husband and are very much looking forward to making her chocolate cupcake for her first birthday we want to be the ones who let her taste sugar for the first time in fact we want to be the ones who experience all the firsts with her my mother and my mother in law are boundary stompers too and evidently they are also slow learners since ask them to leave every time they stomp anyway just wanted you to know that totally understand where you are coming from and would have thrown that ornament in the garbage right next to the advent calendar lol on the other hand of you start letting mother in law like this get away with small things they will move on to larger and larger boundaries until they have their meddling fingers in every aspect of your life oh my god what the heck is she thinking bringing chocolate for month old people continue to surprise me 🤦🏼‍♀️ thank you you re so right thanks for the great advice this is great advice thank you very much my daughter has three one from each grandma and great grandma put all of them up but ornaments are important to me my son only got one guess the second baby is as exciting my son has or baby first christmas ornaments he loves looking at them understand your frustration that she went and got one anyways but is it okay that he has more than one can you donate it or give it to friend for their baby 1st christmas it just self centered and rude of her baby is her do over baby husband must realize respecting boundaries is important do want kid growing up thinking they can disobey you as long as grandma says it okay good luck gt she then asked if there was series or anything thought he would like sorry hit this and my brain came to screeching halt what he like the kid is even year old yet he likes things that are shiny and he can put in his mouth extra points if it lights up this sounds like justnomil post any normal human being would ve respected that the parents would ve been the first to give their kids their birthday present like who cares but by doing this she stomped on your boundaries and is trying to play dominance over you and your so doesn see it as problem definitely post there maybe you might want to go on justnomil yep you need to practice the you had the chance to raise your children please let me have the chance to raise mine had to do this with my mother and although she was initially taken aback she was lot less boundary stomping after that it only going to get worse this is 100 my mil she oversteps and pretends not to understand and loves to play the suffering martyr she was super offended when did let her design their nurseries or make their halloween costumes she complains we do fun things with my mom but she never asked us to go do anything with her she brings the kids some piece of hand me down junk every time she visits she wants to have the biggest best presents for birthdays and xmas and got super offended when sent note to everyone when my daughter was mos old reminding them that she was baby and asking everyone to take it easy on gifts she guilts them into everything and hinges her happiness on them and how they respond to her set line now have felt straight up invisible at my mil house my cousin says that women lose their minds after their first grandkid it is understandable to point ca help but think hey you ve been mom let me do this and you can be grandma this way would just throw it away lol petty but dont care lol girl this infuriates me we were over at my inlaws house last weekend for supper after supper the conversation shifted to my lo upcoming 1st birthday so my mil said baking her cake calmly said don worry about it have the stuff ready dor her cake my mil responded well want it the way made it for my boys my husband of course knows annoyed already so he basically repeated what said so we had another supper at their house yesterday and guess what saw in the spare room where change my lo 1st birthday banners 1st birthday candles 1st birthday party hats and print out of cake design and recipe am livid haha so true bet my mil could only specifically name my lo first toy she got her which do count anything *i* get my baby is her first in my opinion but shhhh do tell mil haha the rest she does even remember and my baby is only mo norway oh yes for sure suspect he ll get more at christmas too which is wonderful just didn like how when she gave it to me she said just had to be the first to get him his first christmas ornament sounds like it time for pre emptive ultimatum what does she think she doing who does she think she is the same as op this is your child your time your experience your responsibility your joy so angry on your behalf mean does she not understand that you already bought his first ornament and therefore hers in the second honestly and this may be slpt would tell her something along the lines of thank you for adding to my baby collection of ornaments it will go great with the one already bought him idk kind of passive aggressive though my daughter was months when her first christmas came around my mil got her first ornament too even after had mentioned how me and my husband were going to go out and get one as family it tore me up as well as many other things she did the first couple of months over stepping her bounds talked to coworker about it who gave me little perspective—it may hurt your feelings little but at least my daughter has all these people who love her soooo much that their willing to do all these things for her and that argument is hard to fight we still have issues but it gets lot better am more assertive and speak my mind and my mil tries to respect that she doesn want to make me mad just love my baby and that all should care about however the haircut is no no that is something that would chap my behind for quite long time ooh nice he could tell his mom to back off since she had her chance to buy baby first everything with her own child it your turn now yeah previous to this she had been bad mouthing her other daughter in law to me complaining about how she doesn let her year old have an entire can of soda then she went on to brag about how when she was babysitting her she would always give her soda whenever she wanted it was shocked said to her you will never be alone with my daughter and my husband nodded in agreement she also tried to pressure me to let her bottle feed her when she was weeks old and was trying to avoid nipple confusion and she tried to talk me into giving her some water in the summer when she was months old had to literally prove to her that this is dangerous with multiple articles before she would finally drop it then when by daughter was having hard time sleeping she tried to convince me to lay her on her stomach and give her blanket pillow and some stuffed animals to sleep with and when she wanted me to come over and was willing to pick me up but my husband had the car and the car seat and said no because we didn have proper car seat for her to get there in she tried to convince me to just hold her on my lap for the 45 minute drive across the city so yah not letting her be alone with my daughter my mil is wonderful grandmother but not so good in the mil department she is very pushy with her opinions is super judgemental and thinks her way of parenting is better than mine she constantly pushes the line and early on let her bully me so badly wanted to be close to her now aim to just be civil and kind she constantly forgets she the grandmother and has undermined me and even once mocked me in front of my children all of it started small even innocent and then once she knew would give in to her she became more and more jnmil talking pushy with everything from questioning our religious beliefs to calling me crazy for bringing my son inside store while he was sleeping the last time had enough and did not speak to her or have the kids call her for months also started firmly putting her in her place and calling her out for undermining me when was disciplining my kids recently at her last visit told my daughter in front of my mil and fil that when it is between me and the grandparents that mommy is the boss playfully but they knew was serious my point is that it all starts out small with the mil they have waited decades to experience motherhood or shade of motherhood again and the anticipation makes them go nuts for many of them this ornament situation might seem insignificant to some but women are catty creatures and she 100 is going to continue she does want boundaries she wants freedom to do things her way my advice is to always try kindness first but be firm sometimes that all it takes and sometimes it takes lot more and do wait for dh to see all the signs at the beginning it took mine years and now he is supportive of me and even confronts her when she needs it love my mil she has done lot for us and loves my kids with her whole heart but mama not playing that game anymore that was extremely immature of her would rather control of the situation first that ornament is staying in its box and not touching my tree second would tell her that extremely disappointed with her current behavior that need to be able to trust that she would abide by my wishes when caring for my child the fact that she went so far to disrespect my decision in so blatant of way means she will not be alone with my child until she regains the broken trust if she does this to your face what will she do behind your back instantly untrustworthy dunno my little one has been sitting through moana since she was months old kid loves moana it her favorite thing to watch fussy she stops if sing moana my dad got her moana doll that she consistently chooses over every other toy she ll be one next month and she getting moana party because she like it 🤷🏼‍♀️ remind her that you are mom not her she had her kids and raised them now it your turn and you have final say personally would just throw the one she got out my mil doesn see my child and hasn since she was months old bc she couldn follow any rules and was always going behind my back and doing things said not to do or buying things said not to buy bc had either already had them or didn think my daughter needed them at the time point is she is not the mom she is grandma and she doesn have say in anything with your child only you do you get that baby ornament yourself and enjoy it if she can respect you tell her sorry but she can see baby unless she follows and respects your wishes regarding your child
